mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM INTNUM, RN, BM.BM_SEQ INTSEQ, BM.BM_PSEQ INTPSEQ, BM.BM_GET_USER STRWRITERCODE, UM.UM_NAME STRNAME, BM.BM_GET_DATE DATGET_DATE, BM.BM_EDIT_DATE DATEDIT_DATE, NVL(CNT.BV_CNT, 0) INTHIT, BM.BM_DETAIL_COMMENT STRDETAILCOMMENT,
CASE
WHEN BM_TITLE IS NULL THEN 'KIND' ELSE BM_TITLE END STRTITLE
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, R.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD_MAIN ORDER BY BM_SEQ DESC ) R
START WITH BM_PSEQ = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR BM_SEQ = BM_PSEQ ) BM
LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_MAIN UM ON (BM.BM_GET_USER = UM.UM_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_VIEW BV ON (BM.BM_SEQ = BV.BV_BM_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BV_BM_SEQ, COUNT(*) BV_CNT FROM BOARD_VIEW GROUP BY BV_BM_SEQ ) CNT ON (BM.BM_SEQ = CNT.BV_BM_SEQ)
WHERE BM.BM_GROUP_BCODE = '400' AND BM.BM_GROUP = '001' AND BM.BM_KIND_BCODE = '401' AND BM.BM_KIND = '002'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_MAIN SELECT NVL(MAX(BM_SEQ), 0) + 1, 0, #{strGroupCode}, #{strGroup}, #{strKindCode}, #{strKind}, #{strTitle}, #{strDetailComment}, #{strWriterCode}, SYSDATE, #{strWriterCode}, SYSDATE FROM BOARD_MAIN
